subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=dài
|c=daai3
|h=pfs=tai
|md=dái
|mn=tì/xm,zz,tp,kh,tn,yl,mg,hc,tc:tè/qz,lk,sx,km,hc:tèr/tài
|mn_note=tì - vernacular; tè/tèr - vernacular (surname); tài - literary
|mn-t=di3/do3/dai3
|mn-t_note=di3 - vernacular; do3 - vernacular (surname); dai3 - literary
|w=2te,2ta
|w_note=2ta - alternative pronunciation for the verb sense
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=v,pn
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: * A different verb, {{zh-l|穿}}, is used for articles of clothing including shirts, jackets, trousers/pants, and shoes.
